Package org.epzilla.common.discovery.node

Class Summary
LeaderPublisher This is the leader service publisher for the cluster node and this class is used to collect details of the other nodes in the same cluster and the dispatchers in the system.
MulticastMessageDecoder This is the multicast message decoder of the cluster nodes and the received multicast messages are sent here and necessary actions are taken from here.
NodeDiscoveryManager This is the node discovery service manager and this class is responsible of initiating the multiast sending, receiving and tcp message decoders.
NodePublisher This is the node service publisher class and all the nodes implement this class and multicast the node service using this class.
TCPMessageDecoder This is the TCP message decoder of the node component.
